item.title: Binance Alpha: MOMOFUN (MM) Trading to Be Launched Today at 16:00, Airdrop Threshold at 200 Points
item.description: On August 3rd, as per official information, Binance Alpha is scheduled to list MOMOFUN (MM) for trading at 16:00 today. Users who hold at least 200 Alpha Points are eligible to claim a 24,000 MM token airdrop.

item.title: A certain whale has bought $300 million worth of ETH in the past 3 days and is now facing an unrealized loss of $26 million.
item.description: On August 3rd, according to Arkham's monitoring, a whale address beginning with 0xdf accumulated ETH worth $300 million through Galaxy Digital OTC trades over the past 3 days. Currently, it is facing an unrealized loss of $26 million.

item.title: Stablecoin Total Market Cap Continues to Rise, Increasing by 0.6% in the Past 7 Days
item.description: On August 3rd, based on DefiLlama data, the current total market value of stablecoins across the entire network is reported to be $2672.27 billion, showing a 0.6% increase over the past 7 days. The market dominance of USDT has dropped to 61.64% (down from 61.9% the previous week).

item.title: Due to factors such as the shockingly low nonfarm payroll data in the US, the probability of a Fed rate cut in September surged to 80.3%.
item.description: On August 3rd, this week in the US, only 73,000 non-farm jobs were added in July, which was much lower than expected. The data for June and May were also revised downward significantly. Meanwhile, Federal Reserve Board Member Cugler will resign next week, enabling Trump to appoint a preferred candidate earlier.Perhaps affected by the above news, on the CME "FedWatch" tool, the probability of a 25-basis-point rate cut by the Federal Reserve in September soared to 80.3%. Before the non-farm payroll data, this figure was only 41.3%.

item.title: Around 560,000 ETH is currently queued to exit the Ethereum PoS network, while over 123,000 ETH is waiting to join.
item.description: On August 3rd, based on the data from the Validator Queue tracking website validatorqueue, the current exit queue on the Ethereum PoS network is temporarily showing 559,412 ETH, which is approximately worth $19.31 billion. There was a recent peak of 744,000 ETH. The waiting time for exiting is about 9 days and 17 hours.At the same time, there are approximately 123,694 ETH queued to join the network, with a value of approximately $4.27 billion. The expected activation delay is about 2 days and 4 hours.Previously reported, this situation reflects the existence of two opposing forces in the market. On the one hand, some stakers may choose to cash out after Ethereum rebounded by more than 160% from its April low, resulting in a surge in the exit queue. On the other hand, new funds deposited due to regulatory optimism and institutional demand are also driving up the entry queue. Publicly traded companies like SharpLink Gaming and BitMine Immersion are increasing their ETH holdings and s

item.title: Hong Kong RWA Registration Platform to Go Live on August 7th
item.description: August 3rd. According to the SCI-Tech Innovation Board Daily, the Hong Kong RWA Registration Platform is scheduled to become operational on August 7th. This initiative is led by the Hong Kong Web 3.0 Standardization Association and is aimed at bridging the entire process service system of dataization, assetization, and financialization in the context of RWA asset tokenization.

item.title: CFX Breaks $0.215, Surging 11.6% in 24 Hours
item.description: On August 3rd, based on HTX market data, CFX has surpassed $0.215 and is currently trading at $0.21594, indicating a 24-hour price increase of 11.6%.

item.title: Elon Musk asked Grok about the probability of quantum computing breaking the Bitcoin algorithm (SHA-256), to which Grok replied, "Almost 0 in the next 5 years."
item.description: August 3rd: According to the published article by IBM on the research progress of quantum computing, Musk inquired of Grok about the probability of quantum computing breaking the Bitcoin algorithm (SHA-256).Grok replied that, based on the investigations by NIST, IBM, and experts for 2025, the probability of quantum computing breaking SHA-256 is "nearly 0% within the next 5 years and will be less than 10% by 2035." This requires millions of error-corrected quantum bits, while current systems only support about 1,000 noisy quantum bits. For now, Bitcoin's hash value remains secure.

item.title: Ethereum Contract-Based Coin Top Holder Balance Drops Over 11% from Historical High
item.description: On August 3rd, based on Coinglass data, the total amount of Ethereum held in DeFi contracts is currently stated to be 13.7473 million ETH. This represents a 11.4% decrease compared to the previous all-time high range of 15.2971 million ETH on July 29th.

item.title: The Satoshi Nakamoto statue in Lugano, Switzerland, was stolen today. The statue was co-founded by Tether.
item.description: On August 3rd, as per BitcoinNews, the statue of Satoshi Nakamoto in Lugano, Switzerland, got stolen today.In October 2024 on the 25th, the city of Lugano in Switzerland unveiled a statue in Ciani Park (Villa Ciani) to pay tribute to the anonymous creator of Bitcoin, Satoshi Nakamoto. This event was organized by the Plan B initiative in cooperation with Tether and the city of Lugano.This statue was crafted by the Italian artist Valentina Picozzi and it took 18 months of research and 3 months to complete.
